key_intropage_subtitle: The objective of this test is to confirm the way you think and make decisions.
key_intropage_consign: You must complete the figures that are shown to you.
key_goal_step1: The goal is to get a circle with a horizontal line. Therefore drag the circle with a horizontal line into the answer field.
key_bad_response: That's not the right answer! Please try again!
key_indication_step1: If you can't work it out, click on the question mark to find out the correct answer.
key_goal_step2: The goal is to get a circle with a thick outline. To do this, drag the circle with an '/'.Then drag an empty circle to get the same figure as the 2 others.
key_warning_step1: There are still some questions left…
key_warning_step2: Are you sure you want to move to the next stage?
key_finish_congrats_message_2: Great! Nothing can stop you now...
key_finish_congrats_message_4: Bravo! Only a few more clicks to discover your results...
key_finish_last_message: Congratulations! You've successfully finished the BRAIN UP test.
key_feedback_useful: This test seems useful to me.
key_thanks_p1: Your responses will help us to continue developing BRAIN UP and improve our candidate experience.
key_warning3: The next phase of the test will be online soon…stay connected!
key_thanks_p2: Just a reminder, the results won't have any impact on your current profile: it's just for science & fun!
key_ranking_p1: Do you want to find out your ranking compared to other participants who've taken BRAIN UP?
key_leaderboard_info1: Check out our leaderboard which will give you an exact ranking.
key_leaderboard_info2: Your results will then be visible to other participants.
key_leaderboard_info3: You can manage your scores' visibility at any time in your account settings.
key_skip_leaderboard_button: I don't want to see the results.
key_error_message:
An error has occurred.
If the problem persists, please contact support.
